projects.name: Open Source Contribution
projects.description: Contributed to an open-source Ruby on Rails project, enhancing the TA assignment workflow by reimplementing and optimizing the 'Add TA to Course' feature, improving usability and scalabilit

projects.name: PackTravel
projects.description: PackTravel is a web and mobile application designed to facilitate off-campus travel for university students. It aims to bridge the gap between on-campus transportation (e.g., Wolfline) and the need for longer-distance or flexible travel options by providing access to cabs, rental cars, and ride-sharing services. The platform ensures affordability, convenience, and user-friendly accessibility for students without personal vehicles.

projects.name: Movie Mood
projects.description: Movie Mood is a personalized movie recommendation platform that matches suggestions to your mood, eliminating endless scrolling. Powered by an advanced Mood-Based Recommendation Algorithm, it brings the perfect movie to your screen instantly.

projects.name: Blog Post
projects.description: The MERN Stack Blogging Platform is a full-stack web application that allows users to create, read, update, delete (CRUD) blogs and add comments on blogs written by other users. The application is built to deliver a scalable, modern, and responsive user experience.

projects.name: Covid19 Tracker
projects.description: The Live COVID-19 Tracker is a web application designed to provide real-time visualization of COVID-19 cases across the globe. The application uses Leaflet.js for interactive mapping, Chart.js for data visualization through charts, and fetches reliable data directly from the World Health Organization (WHO) API or dataset.

projects.name: IPR Portal
projects.description: The Intellectual Property Marketplace is a web application designed to enable users to buy, sell, and bid on intellectual property (IP) assets such as patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets. The platform serves as a centralized hub for IP transactions, ensuring secure, transparent, and efficient interactions between buyers, sellers, and bidders.
